ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or is the Unseen in their hands, so they can write out what is to happen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or do they have knowledge of the unknown which they copy down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or do they have any knowledge of the Unseen which they are now writing down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they possess the knowledge of the unseen which confirms the truthfulness of their belief?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or that they possess the hidden, so they are writing it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or that the Unseen is in their hands, so that they can write it down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they (the knowledge of) the unseen, so that they write (it) down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or is the Unseen in their keeping, and so they are writing it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or is the Unseen theirs that they can write (thereof)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is the unseen within their grasp so that they write it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is with them the unseen, so that they write down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they possess [access to] the Unseen, so that they write it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or that the Unseen is in their hands, so that they can write it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or that the Ghaib (unseen here in this Verse it means Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz) is in their hands, so that they can write it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, is the Unseen with them, and they are writing it down!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they know the future, and so they write it down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:47] Or do they possess [access to] the Unseen, that is, [access to] the Preserved Tablet which contains [knowledge of] the Unseen, so that they are writing down?, from it what they say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or is the Unseen) the Guarded Tablet (theirs that they can write (thereof)) that with which they argue against you?
